name: Alchemy Sliver
description:
You want to be an alchemist, but you need a scholarship and the only way you have to get that is to take a practical exam! 

Snuggle up in the cottage provided by the school, eating their food, and sleeping in their bed. All you have to do is throw together the ingredients they give you into the products they have given you descriptions for. 

Having trouble? Try reading the books! 

Hello there! 

Thanks for bothering to read and/or play. This is my first finished project. Yes, I might have to come back and fiddle with some things, but committing and publishing is the furthest step I have ever taken in any project. Even after all the playtesting, I feel much better just pressing publish. 

This is meant to be part of a larger string of projects where I fiddle with different systems until I get them how I like them. Then, I can shove them together in a larger game. 

I will link a full play through after a time, so I can make changes if need be. 

That Guy That Does Things will likely be playing my game and is a generally fun guy to watch. I will update with a more specific link to a playthrough when applicable.
